alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 1:32PM MST until August 18 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and west central Arizona, including the following locations, Page, Grand Cnayon, Vermilion Cliffs, Supai, Ash Fork, Seligman, Chino Valley, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Camp Verde, and Black Canyon City. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. Unpaved roads could become muddy and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
